Help.brief: Returns the usage of a command.

Echo.brief: The bot says what you want it to.

SetPrefix.brief: Sets/gets the prefix of the bot.
SetPrefix.additional: Giving no arguments returns the current prefix.

Enable.brief: Enables a command or module for use.

Disable.brief: Disables a command or module from being used.

SetPrimaryChannel.brief: Sets the channel for unprompted bot messages.

Top.additional: Providing a single argument iwll treat it as the max.

GiveXp.brief: Gives a certain amount of XP to a specified user.
GiveXp.additional: You can either give XP directly, or give a certain number of levels to the user.

TakeXp.brief: Takes a certain amount of XP from a specified user.
TakeXp.additional: You can either take XP directly, or take a certain number of levels from the user.

Rank.brief: Used to control the ranking system.
Rank.additional:
**Rank List**: Lists the ranks of the current server.
**Rank Add**: Adds a new rank with specified name and minimum level.
**Rank Remove**: Removes the rank with the specified name.
**Rank Edit**: Edits the name or minimum level of the specified rank.

Wallet.brief: Shows info relating to the user's currency data.
Wallet.additional: If no argument is provided, it shows the wallet of the user who queried.

Daily.brief: Collects the user's extra credits for the day.
Daily.additional: The daily reward resets every 24 hours. Make sure to collect it every time!

Donate.brief: Gives the specified user currency from your wallet.

Steal.brief: Chance to steal an amount from a user, otherwise it will fine you.
Steal.additional: The more you try to steal, the less likely it will be to succeed.

Compensate.brief: Adds some amount to everyone's (or a specified user's) balance.
Compensate.additional: Negative values will take money away.

Richlist.brief: Displays a list of the richest people on the server.
Richlist.additional: Providing a single argument will treat it as the max.

Gamble.brief: Play a game of chance with this command.
Gamble.additional: If no bet is provided by the user, one will be provided by default.

Bribe.brief: Attempt to bribe your way out of jail.
Bribe.additional: Careful! Your jail time might be extended...

Claim.brief: Claims the giveaway prize when it comes out.

SetCurrencyName.brief: Sets the name and abbreviation for the currency unit.
SetCurrencyName.additional: Giving no arguments returns the current currency name and abbreviation.

SetMaxDebt.brief: Sets the maximum amount of debt a user can be in.
SetMaxDebt.additional:
A max debt of -100 means the user can go down to -100 coins.
Giving no arugments returns the current maximum debt.

SetDailyReward.brief: Sets the reward for collecting a daily.
SetDailyReward.additional: Giving no arguments returns the current daily reward.

SetDailyStreakBonus.brief: Sets the reward for maintaining a daily streak.
SetDailyStreakBonus.additional: Giving no arguments returns the current daily streak bonus.

SetDailyStreakBonusPeriod.brief: Sets how often a daily streak bonus is achieved..
SetDailyStreakBonusPeriod.additional: Giving no arguments returns the current daily streak bonus period.

SetStealSuccessChance.brief: Sets the base chance for a steal to succeed.
SetStealSuccessChance.additional:
Must be a value between 0 and 1.
Giving no arugments returns the current success chance.

SetRandomGiveawayChance.brief: Sets the chance (per message) for a random giveaway to occur.
SetRandomGiveawayChance.additional:
Must be a value between 0 and 1.
Giving no arugments returns the current random giveaway chance.

SetRandomGiveawayReward.brief: Sets the reward for collecting a random giveaway.
SetRandomGiveawayReward.additional: Giving no arugments returns the current random giveaway reward.

SetStealFine.brief: Sets the proportion of the attempted steal amount which will be taken as a fine.
SetStealFine.additional:
Must be a value between 0 an 1.
Giving no arugments returns the current fine.

SetStealVictimBonus.brief: Sets the proportion of the attempted steal amount which will be given to the victim.
SetStealVictimBonus.additional:
Must be a value between 0 and 1.
Giving no arugments returns the current victim bonus.

SetStealJailTime.brief: Sets the number of minutes in jail after a failed steal.
SetStealJailTime.additional: Giving no arugments returns the current steal jail time.

SetBribeSuccessChance.brief: Sets the min and max chance of a bribe succeeding.
SetBribeSuccessChance.additional: Giving no arugments returns the current success chances.

SetBribeAmount.brief: Sets the min and max accepted bribe amounts.
SetBribeAmount.additional: Giving no arugments returns the current range of accepted bribes.

SetBribeExtraJailTime.brief: Sets the amount of extra jail time (in minutes) after a failed bribe.
SetBribeExtraJailTime.additional: Giving no arugments returns the current extra jail time.

SetGambleDefaultBet.brief: Sets the default bet for a gamble game.
SetGambleDefaultBet.additional:
This is used when no argument is provided to gamble. 
Giving no arugments returns the current default bet.

SetGambleTimeout.brief: Sets how long the bot will wait for a response before timing-out a gamble game.
SetGambleTimeout.additional: Giving no arugments returns the current gamble timeout.
